0914CFEA.Line13.710B6: Make no mistake, this war is holy. Lilith has brought the Eternal Conflict to Sanctuary. And Inarius will deliver us, as writ in prophecy.

47A4002A.Line31.710B6: Until then, we have our parts to play. Make a pilgrimage to the Alabaster Monastery. Cleanse your spirit. Then we may discuss a blessing.

E19879AC.Line33.710B6: First, you will be made worthy of a blessing. A holy war canâ€™t be won with faithless troops.
